title: How Jeffrey Epstein secured visas, sham marriages for women in his trafficking network
summary_full: Newly released US Department of Justice files reveal Jeffrey Epstein exploited student visas, English schools, and marriages to manage women's immigration status. He sponsored language programs and pursued work visas, even arranging a marriage for one woman to secure permanent residency and citizenship.
